original_text: Whatever is set aside from the holy offerings the Israelites present to the Lord I give to you and your sons and daughters as your perpetual share. It is an everlasting covenant of salt before the Lord for both you and your offspring.”
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 여호와께 거제로 드리는 모든 성물은 내가 영구한 몫의 음식으로 너와 네 자녀에게 주노니 이는 여호와 앞에 너와 네 후손에게 영원한 소금 언약이니라

sentences.original_text: Whatever is set aside from the holy offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 거룩한 헌물에서 따로 구별된 것은 무엇이든지

sentences.original_text: the Israelites present to the Lord
I give to you and your sons and daughters
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너와 네 아들들과 딸들에게 준다

sentences.original_text: It is an everlasting covenant of salt
for both you and your offspring
